track.name: The Suburbs (Continued)
comments: Someone once said that it's length it's perfectly fine because the whole idea behind the album is nostalgia and particularly, both "The suburbs" and "The suburbs (continued)" are the most nostalgic songs on this record, so why make it longer? we should long the song, we should want more of it as we want more of that wonderful summer we once lived with our loved ones, or the childhood moments we would die to re live. It's about being nostalgic, about longing something. So yep, i don't want it to be longer. I love it just the way it is :-)
i would LOVE to waste it again...
Shivers, shivers everywhere.
masterpiece
one of the all-time most criminal fadeouts. it would've been incredible to have this build -- but to at least have let that last coda hang around a little longer would have sufficed. ;(
Sends shivers done my spine
Here again, early failures remembrance
If I could have it back...
omg...ended too soon...too soon.
It's so...perfect
Alone in the middle of the night of a black city, you just lost you girlfriend...
Lovely
One of my favorite songs. It's so...perfect.
I'd love to waste it again and again and again..
so perfect.

Absolutely perfect video for this song (and no, I didn't make it):
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MjkJyHevEzM
What a perfect ending. Goosebumps.
That song hurts
I never knew a one minute and thirty two second piece of music could be so beautiful.
Sensational finale to a masterpiece by a band who can do no wrong.
